support_us_description: Running the Foundation and conducting the activities both require financial outlays and the effort of our volunteers. If you appreciate our work, you can donate any amount to support our future efforts.
donations_intro: One-time or systematic payments of any amount to the Foundation's account.
cooperation_description: Companies may support us in various ways. Please consider donating our projects, patronage or any form of cooperation in AI-related projects we can do together.
cooperation_benefits: The logotypes of our partners will be put on the website of the AI Embassy Foundation.
